MainActivity
Success isn\'t owned. It\'s leased, and rent is due every day. -J.J Watts
Write drunk. Edit sober. -Ernest Hemingway
Some convictions are so strong that the world must break to accommodate them. -Vindicate
The best minds of my generations are thinking about how to make people click adds. That sucks. -Jeff Hammerbacher.
Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone. -Pablo Picasso
Freedom lies in being Bold. -Robert Frost
Listen, Smile, Agree, then do whatever the fuck you were going to do anyway. -Robert Downey Jr.
(…)Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure(…)-Marianne Williamson
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now. -Ancient Chinese Proverb
Those who stand for nothing, fall for anything. -Alexander Hamilton
Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go. -T.S.Eliot
Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can\'t achieve it. -Jordan Belfort.
If you want to take the island, burn the boat. -Tony Robbins
When you have exhausted all possibilities remember this: You haven\'t. -Thomas A. Edison
Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked, there is no reason not to follow your heart. -Steve Jobs
